ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the subcategory of t
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the subcategory of the ECG finding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the ECG finding subcategory, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EGSCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology. This would most commonly be either a heading, or a pre-printed category value on the CRF and not a question to which the site would provide an answer. If a question is asked, the response would typically be a sponsor-defined codelist. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as "Subcategory" can be included as the column header EGSCAT can only be used if there is an EGCAT and it must be a subcategorization of EGCAT.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-9 ak Released per governance approval.; 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.24.18
